title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: There are several launchpads on the market, but only a few of them are having an impact. Different launchpads provide various features and benefits to both investors and project owners. The finest on the market provide straightforward and customizable usability as well as comprehensive steps to reduce the danger of fraud and failure.Projects that use launchpads seek to gather funding by giving their coins at a reduced price to increase demand and draw more investor attention to the project before making it public.AdLunam, the industry's first NFT-integrated Engage to Earn seed crowdfunding and IDO launchpad leveraging a Proof of Attention model, is one such launchpad.Learn more: https://adlunam.cc

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: The popularity of cryptocurrencies has seen exponential growth in the past few years. It all started with bitcoin, but now, there are over 18,000 cryptocurrencies in existence (as of March 2022). This level of growth in such a short period is remarkable and has benefitted early adopters of the nascent industry.The rise of cryptos has also attracted a plethora of investors, leading to even more innovations in the crypto industry. These innovations are now accelerating the acceptance of cryptocurrencies and other decentralised projects.One innovation that facilitates this acceleration and benefits would-be entrepreneurs and ardent enthusiasts is the creation of the crypto launchpad platforms. â€¨One such platform is AdLunam, the industry's first NFT-integrated Engage to Earn seed crowdfunding and IDO launchpad leveraging a Proof of Attention model, is one such launchpad.Learn more: https://adlunam.cc
